CustomField.description: This field is optional and is populated by the Section Builder tool. The field denotes whether a section configuration should return only records that meet the specified criteria. The value should use appropriate syntax for the WHERE clause of a SOQL query. The default value is empty and returns all records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is optional and is populated by the Section Builder tool. The field denotes whether a tier should return only records that meet the specified criteria. The value should use appropriate syntax for the WHERE clause of a SOQL query.
CustomField.label: Filter Criteria
